scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.setup-dev: npm install && lerna bootstrap && lerna run build
scripts.clean: lerna run clean && lerna exec npm run rimraf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && lerna clean --yes && npm run rimraf node_modules
scripts.test:generate-test-app: npx rimraf packages/test-generator/test-app-templates/src/ui-components && lerna run build --stream && node packages/test-generator/dist/generators/GenerateTestApp.js
scripts.browser-integration:setup: npm run browser-integration:create && npm run browser-integration:install
scripts.browser-integration:create: (cd packages && npx create-react-app browser-integration-test --use-npm --template typescript) && echo 'SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true' > packages/browser-integration-test/.env && cp -r packages/test-generator/browser-integration-test-templates/* packages/browser-integration-test
scripts.browser-integration:install: lerna bootstrap && lerna add --scope browser-integration-test @amzn/studio-ui-codegen-react && lerna add --scope browser-integration-test @amzn/test-generator && lerna add --no-ci --scope browser-integration-test cypress
